main event: Bright light observed moving rapidly from SE to NW, descended rapidly and disappeared after being observed for 1.5 to 2 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 15 May 1963 at 1426Z., The object was seen at an elevation of 15-20 degrees., Sources of observation included both military and civilian personnel., The object was seen moving with no sound reported., Concluded with no determination of identification.
sighted object: bright glowing object in the sky
witness description: military personnel, airline pilots, and attendants
